---
title: 'CA2361: ReadXml ()를 포함 하는 자동 생성 클래스가 신뢰할 수 없는 데이터와 함께 사용 되지 않는지 확인 합니다 (코드 분석).'
description: 코드 분석 규칙 CA2361에 대해 알아봅니다. ReadXml ()을 포함 하는 자동 생성 된 클래스는 신뢰할 수 없는 데이터에 사용 되지 않아야 합니다.

# <a name="ca2361-ensure-autogenerated-class-containing-datasetreadxml-is-not-used-with-untrusted-data"></a><span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-103">CA2361: DataSet.ReadXml()을 포함하는 자동 생성된 클래스가 신뢰할 수 없는 데이터와 함께 사용되지 않도록 하기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-103">CA2361: Ensure autogenerated class containing DataSet.ReadXml() is not used with untrusted data</span></span>

| | <span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-104">값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-104">Value</span></span> |
|-|-|
| <span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-105">**규칙 ID**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-105">**Rule ID**</span></span> |<span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-106">CA2361</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-106">CA2361</span></span>|
| <span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-107">**범주**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-107">**Category**</span></span> |<span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-108">Microsoft.Security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-108">Microsoft.Security</span></span>|
| <span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-109">**수정이 중단 되거나 중단 되지 않습니다.**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-109">**Fix is breaking or non-breaking**</span></span> |<span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-110">최신이 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-110">Non-breaking</span></span>|

## <a name="cause"></a><span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-111">원인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-111">Cause</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-112"><xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>메서드가 호출 되었거나 참조 되었으며 자동 생성 된 코드 내에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-112">The <xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method was called or referenced, and is within autogenerated code.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-113">이 규칙은 자동으로 생성 되는 코드 b를 분류 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-113">This rule classifies autogenerated code b:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-114">이라는 메서드 내에 `ReadXmlSerializable` 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-114">Being inside a method named `ReadXmlSerializable`.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-115">`ReadXmlSerializable`메서드에는이 <xref:System.Diagnostics.DebuggerNonUserCodeAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType> 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-115">The `ReadXmlSerializable` method has a <xref:System.Diagnostics.DebuggerNonUserCodeAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType>.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-116">메서드는가 있는 `ReadXmlSerializable` 형식 내에 <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerCategoryAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType> 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-116">The `ReadXmlSerializable` method is within a type that has a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerCategoryAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType>.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-117">[CA2351](ca2351.md) 는가 자동 <xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 생성 되지 않은 코드 내에 표시 되는 경우와 유사한 규칙입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-117">[CA2351](ca2351.md) is a similar rule, for when <xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> appears within non-autogenerated code.</span></span>

## <a name="rule-description"></a><span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-118">규칙 설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-118">Rule description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-119">신뢰할 수 없는 입력으로를 deserialize 할 때 <xref:System.Data.DataSet> 공격자는 서비스 거부 공격을 수행할 악성 입력을 만들 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-119">When deserializing a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> with untrusted input, an attacker can craft malicious input to perform a denial of service attack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-120">알 수 없는 원격 코드 실행 취약점이 있을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-120">There may be unknown remote code execution vulnerabilities.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-121">이 규칙은 [CA2351](ca2351.md)와 비슷하지만 GUI 응용 프로그램 내에서 데이터의 메모리 내 표현을 위한 자동 생성 코드의 경우입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-121">This rule is like [CA2351](ca2351.md), but for autogenerated code for an in-memory representation of data within a GUI application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-122">일반적으로 이러한 자동 생성 클래스는 신뢰할 수 없는 입력에서 deserialize 되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-122">Usually, these autogenerated classes aren't deserialized from untrusted input.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-123">응용 프로그램의 사용이 다를 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-123">Your application's usage may vary.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-124">자세한 내용은 [DataSet 및 DataTable 보안 지침](../../../framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/security-guidance.md)을 참조 하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-124">For more information, see [DataSet and DataTable security guidance](../../../framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/security-guidance.md).</span></span>

## <a name="how-to-fix-violations"></a><span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-125">위반 문제를 해결하는 방법</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-125">How to fix violations</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-126">가능 하면 대신 [Entity Framework](/ef/) 를 사용 <xref:System.Data.DataSet> 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-126">If possible, use [Entity Framework](/ef/) rather than the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-127">Serialize 된 데이터를 변조 방지로 설정 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-127">Make the serialized data tamper-proof.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-128">Serialization 후 직렬화 된 데이터를 암호화 하 여 서명 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-128">After serialization, cryptographically sign the serialized data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-129">Deserialization 전에 암호화 서명 유효성을 검사 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-129">Before deserialization, validate the cryptographic signature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-130">암호화 키가 공개 되지 않도록 보호 하 고 키 회전을 설계 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-130">Protect the cryptographic key from being disclosed and design for key rotations.</span></span>

## <a name="when-to-suppress-warnings"></a><span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-131">경고를 표시 하지 않는 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-131">When to suppress warnings</span></span>

[!INCLUDE[insecure-deserializers-common-safe-to-suppress](~/includes/code-analysis/insecure-deserializers-common-safe-to-suppress.md)]

## <a name="pseudo-code-examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-132">의사 코드 예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-132">Pseudo-code examples</span></span>

### <a name="violation"></a><span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-133">위반</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-133">Violation</span></span>

```csharp
namespace ExampleNamespace
{
    /// <summary>
    ///Represents a strongly typed in-memory cache of data.
    ///</summary>
    [global::System.Serializable()]
    [global::System.ComponentModel.DesignerCategoryAttribute("code")]
    [global::System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItem(true)]
    [global::System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaProviderAttribute("GetTypedDataSetSchema")]
    [global::System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute("Package")]
    [global::System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute("vs.data.DataSet")]
    public partial class Something : global::System.Data.DataSet {

        [global::System.Diagnostics.DebuggerNonUserCodeAttribute()]
        [global::System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratedCodeAttribute("System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGenerator", "4.0.0.0")]
        protected override void ReadXmlSerializable(global::System.Xml.XmlReader reader) {
            if ((this.DetermineSchemaSerializationMode(reader) == global::System.Data.SchemaSerializationMode.IncludeSchema)) {
                this.Reset();
                global::System.Data.DataSet ds = new global::System.Data.DataSet();
                ds.ReadXml(reader);
                if ((ds.Tables["Something"] != null)) {
                    base.Tables.Add(new SomethingTable(ds.Tables["Something"]));
                }
                this.DataSetName = ds.DataSetName;
                this.Prefix = ds.Prefix;
                this.Namespace = ds.Namespace;
                this.Locale = ds.Locale;
                this.CaseSensitive = ds.CaseSensitive;
                this.EnforceConstraints = ds.EnforceConstraints;
                this.Merge(ds, false, global::System.Data.MissingSchemaAction.Add);
                this.InitVars();
            }
            else {
                this.ReadXml(reader);
                this.InitVars();
            }
        }
    }
}
```

[<span data-ttu-id="6ffb3-141">CA2356: 웹 deserialize 된 개체 그래프의 안전 하지 않은 데이터 집합 또는 DataTable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ffb3-141">CA2356: Unsafe DataSet or DataTable in web deserialized object graph</span></span>](ca2356.md)
